text: The RPK-74 is a Russian light machine gun. It is a version of the AK-74 assault rifle. It is the same caliber as the latter: the 5.45 Ã— 39mm. It uses 45 or 75 round magazines, but can also use compatible 30 round AK-74 magazines. Its barrel is longer and reinforced. Category:Light machine guns Category:Machine guns
title: RPK-74
